description: Marks a custom action as deleted. PollForJobs for the custom action fails after the action is marked for deletion. Used for custom actions only.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: The category of the custom action that you want to delete, such as source or deploy.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The provider of the service used in the custom action, such as CodeDeploy.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the custom action to delete.
